titleStmt.title: The humble and just remonstrance. Of the knights, citizens, and burgesses, in Parliament assembled in Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: At head of text: To the Right Honovrable, the Lord Deputie [Robert, Earl of Leicester].
In this edition line three of the title reads: "And jvst"; line eight of the title reads "in Ireland".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
